task_2.payment_request_email:
Subject: Payment Request for Artist Services - [Month, Year] Earnings

Dear [Client/Payer Name],

This email is to formally request payment for services provided for [Artist/Performer/Athlete Name] for the month of [Month, Year].

As per our contract agreement, a commission of 10% is applicable to the total earnings for this period. The total earnings for [Month, Year] amount to $50,000.00, resulting in a commission due of $5,000.00.

Please remit payment of $5,000.00 at your earliest convenience. Payment can be made via [Specify preferred payment method, e.g., bank transfer to the account details provided in the contract or by check payable to [Your Company/Name]].

If payment has already been processed, please disregard this email. Should you have any questions or require further clarification, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
[Your Title/Agency Name]
[Your Contact Information]
